feed.title: Actual AI Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 1.4.4 @actual/api v25.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump @types/node from 22.10.1 to 22.10.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/87
  • Bump nanoid from 3.3.7 to 3.3.8 in the npm_and_yarn group by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/91
  • Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 8.17.0 to 8.18.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/95
  • Bump ai from 4.0.13 to 4.0.22 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/92
  • Bump @ai-sdk/google from 1.0.5 to 1.0.12 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/93
  • Bump @ai-sdk/anthropic from 1.0.4 to 1.0.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/94
  • Bump @types/node from 22.10.2 to 22.10.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/99
  • Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 8.17.0 to 8.19.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/100
  • Bump ai from 4.0.22 to 4.0.26 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/101
  • Bump @ai-sdk/openai from 1.0.7 to 1.0.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/102
  • Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 8.18.1 to 8.19.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/103
  • Bump packages by @sakowicz in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/105

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/1.4.3...1.4.4

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 1.4.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Don't process split transaction parent by @sakowicz in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/110

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/1.4.4...1.4.5

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 1.5.0 Allow to create your own prompt
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow to specify your own template by @sakowicz in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/112
  • Bump ai from 4.0.31 to 4.0.40 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/111
  • Bump @ai-sdk/openai from 1.0.16 to 1.0.18 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/108
  • Bump @ai-sdk/google from 1.0.14 to 1.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/113

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/1.4.5...1.5.0

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 1.6.0 Actual Tags support
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use tags for guessed / missed transactions | Migrate old notes to tags by @sakowicz in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/114

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/1.5.0...1.6.0

entry.title: New release for Actual AI: 1.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • LLM should choose from enum categories ID, so prompt can be simplified by @sakowicz in https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/pull/115

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sakowicz/actual-ai/compare/1.6.0...1.7.0
